plot: A young man spontaneously teleports and disappears at a young age. As he struggle to deal with his unique disorder, he finds himself alone and disoriented as he continues to try and find his way back home.
title: Tele
plot_es: A young man spontaneously teleports and disappears at a young age. As he struggle to deal with his unique disorder, he finds himself alone and disoriented as he continues to try and find his way back home.
plot_en: A young man spontaneously teleports and disappears at a young age. As he struggle to deal with his unique disorder, he finds himself alone and disoriented as he continues to try and find his way back home.
